item.title: Conslog
item.author: marc@hrmn.dev (Marc Hermann)
item.description: Did you know that JavaScript learners spend more than 50 percent of their time surrounding code challenge test cases with console.log()? I was one of them. Until I created Conslog, a little VS Code snippet extension to make my life (and yours?) easier.
